name: Hardest Fractured Breakfast Cereal Brands Trivia Quiz | Brain Teasers | 15 Questions

questions.text: We'll start with an easy one: Tricks.
questions.explanation:
Trix.

	Silly rabbit, Trix are for kids.

questions.correct: Kellogg's Corn Flakes & Kelloggs Corn Flakes
questions.explanation:
Kellogg's Corn Flakes & Kelloggs Corn Flakes.

	This cereal has a great big giant rooster on the box.

questions.correct: Cap n Crunch & Cap 'n Crunch & Cap'n Crunch & Cap' n Crunch & Capn Crunch
questions.explanation:
Cap n Crunch & Cap 'n Crunch & Cap'n Crunch & Cap' n Crunch & Capn Crunch.

	Sorry, folks, I'm not accepting 'Captain.'

Frosted Flakes.

	'They're GRRREAT!' according to Tony the Tiger.

Cocoa Puffs.

	The ads featured a psychotic bird that kept running in circles and shrieking 'Cuckoo for Cocoa Puffs!'

Product 19.

	What a strange name, huh?

Froot Loops & Fruit Loops.

	I shouldn't have accepted 'Fruit Loops,' because it's actually 'Froot,' but I'm a kindly old quiz maker.

Mini-Wheats & Mini Wheats.

	They don't call 'em 'Frosted Mini-Wheats' anymore. But they're still sugar frosted!

Honeycomb & Honey Comb & Honey-Comb.

	'Honeycomb, breakfast, sweet as honey, Post Honeycomb for your own [home?]'

Special K.

	I thought the 'K' stood for Kellogg's, but a player informs me that it stands for potassium.

Cocoa Krispies.

	Sorry, kids, can't accept 'Crispies.'

questions.correct: Malt-o-Meal & Malto Meal & Malt o Meal
questions.explanation:
Malt-o-Meal & Malto Meal & Malt o Meal.

	Does it really taste like malt?

Count Chocula.

	Is he related to The Count on Sesame Street?

Cream of Wheat.

	That nice bland hot cereal with the tiny white granules. It's similar to grits, but not as good, in my opinion.

Golden Grahams.

	Never tried 'em. But genius-lex says they are delicious and LisaDale eats 'em right out of the box as a snack.
